task.title: Flatten Data with a Jython Evaluator
task.shortdesc: To flatten data from the delimited data record format, let's use a Jython script with the Jython Evaluator.

context.p: Flattening the delimited data converts the data from list format to a single level. After flattening the records, you no longer need to use delimited functions to return field data, or use an index in the field path.
For example, before flattening, we used the following field path to reference the field with credit card numbers: [20]/value. After flattening, you use the following field path: /credit_card.
